channel.title: [Class Rework Suggestion] Apostle
channel.description:
Since the Noble was re-introduced to the game, Apostle had to undergo some serious changes which I do not agree with. In fact, this converted class became a carbon copy of Noble for the Cult. Compared to Invoker, Ritualist and Seeker, this doesn't fit the theme at all and has been bothering me ever since the patch came out.
My proposition on how to rework this class, as following:
**Class name:** Apostle; **Type:** Social; **Faction:** Cult; **Converted from:** Psychic, Noble; **Unique:** No.
**Passive Abilities:** 'Dark Words' - Allows the Cult to communicate with its dead members while you are alive.
**Day Abilities:** 'Compelling Presence' [2] charges - Force a player to accuse another player and prevent them from voting further. 'Voice of Corax' [1] charge - Your next two messages will be telepathically sent to all Cult members.
**Night Abilities:** 'Eavesdrop' [2] charges - You will be able to hear the first 4 whispers tomorrow. 'Mindwarp' [2] charges - Cause a player to receive incorrect feedback from their abilities tonight.
**Conclusion:** These changes intend to make Apostle _fit_ into the Cult like other converts while still being able to reliably prove himself. 'Compelling Presence' and 'Eavesdrop' will help Apostle to decieve others into thinking that he is a Noble, while 'Voice of Corax' and 'Dark Words' focus on the Social aspect of the class. Being able to properly utilize 'Mindwarp' will help the Cult to swing the game in their favor as well. This suggestion might not be properly balanced out, yet I think that it would not be too strong, considering that Psychic is a unique class that is not guaranteed to spawn and the chances of converting a Noble are relatively low. Please let me know your opinion on this.

item.title: [Class Rework Suggestion] Apostle
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
I like the idea. Compelling Presence is identical to Cult Pressure, so that’s good.
I guess Voice of Corax works, but I’m not sure it is super useful. It might be better if it had the Psychic/Illusionist telepathic message, since any Psychic claim is impossible without it.
Eavesdrop seems kind of arbitrary, and doesn’t really work like noble, so maybe keep Cult Spy?
Mindwarp definitely works.

Dark Words is also pretty nice, because it lets the dead cult do something, and pass on information. I do think this would be better than the current Apostle.

item.title: [Class Rework Suggestion] Apostle
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
anon29151597:

Voice of Corax is there so you can coordinate the Cult during the day, as a replacement to old Silent Whispers. As an example, you Eavesdrop [6] whispering King that he is a Prince and [12] claimed Hunter in jail. You use VoC to relay this to the Cult immediately in case you are jailed next or are about to be put on trial.

My intent for this ability was to alert your allies during the day if something crucial happens or if you hear some urgent information. Situational? Perhaps, but I think it would still be more or less useful.

But silent whispers would achieve the same purpose. Maybe it could be changed into a passive instead that gives the cult a separate chat during the day?

anon29151597:

That would just make Apostle same as Noble (the whole design which I’m trying to discard), only 100 times more OP.

But the current version you have is useless. Maybe make it so it can hear all whispers, but only has 1 use?

anon29151597:

So thats literally same as Noble again

Nothing wrong with that. Noble and psychic are the only 2 convertable social classes.

anon29151597:

How is it not useful, if this completely screws an Investigative class and gives you a chance to kill them for feeding wrong feedback to the court?

It only has 2 uses though. And snoop is a bit more useful since it can reveal your target’s class and any information they have.

That would be way too powerful in my opinion. Apostle is just a Cult convert, why should he have both of the Nobles abilities in one? As for your comment on “first 4 whispers not being enough”, I really doubt people will be spamming crap at the start of the day just to prevent the possibility of that happening. item.title: [Class Rework Suggestion] Apostle
item.dc:creator: anon29151597
item.description:
Indeed, but its not like you are put up on trial immediately after getting converted or starting a game. Besides, BD voting someone up just to prove you is +1 wasted trial + wasted time. You can also force someone to accuse and say you already used your ability. Its much more convenient to make Noble use Pressure and if you suspect its Apostle - let Paladin investigate them (thats where Ritualist’s Brotherhood even comes into play).

Its not like everyone asks outed Drunks to Happyhour a target immediately next night either and the whole situation is same as asking converted Psychic to use Telepathy. You have to be found by BD first. Besides, you might be asked to Snoop or MS someone instead buying you another night. Even then you can pretend you sent a spy on ANYONE with Eavesdrop or just Snoop any of your Cult members.
